foods.name: Roasted Chicken
instructions: Preheat oven to 425째F.
Pat chicken dry with paper towels and rub all over with olive oil.
Season chicken with salt and black pepper, rubbing into the skin.
Stuff cavity with garlic, lemon slices, and thyme sprigs.
Place chicken in a roasting pan and roast for 1 hour and 15 minutes or until internal temperature reaches 165째F.
Let chicken rest for 10 minutes before carving and serving.

foods.name: Beef Tacos
instructions: In a large skillet, cook ground beef over medium-high heat until browned, about 5-7 minutes.
Add onion and garlic to skillet and cook until softened, about 3-5 minutes.
Stir in cumin, chili powder, paprika, salt, and black pepper, cooking for an additional 1-2 minutes.
Warm tortillas in a separate skillet over medium heat.
To assemble tacos, spoon beef mixture onto each tortilla and top with chopped cilantro and a squeeze of lime juice.
Serve immediately.

foods.name: Caprese Salad
instructions: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on a serving platter.
Sprinkle chopped basil over the top.
In a small bowl, whisk together balsamic vinegar, olive oil, salt, and black pepper.
Drizzle dressing over the salad.
Serve immediately.

foods.name: Pesto Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Drain pasta and return to the pot.
Add pesto sauce, Parmesan cheese, salt, and black pepper to the pot, stirring to combine.
Warm pasta over low heat, stirring frequently, until sauce is heated through and cheese is melted, about 3-5 minutes.
Serve pasta topped with chopped parsley.
foods.name: Banana Pancakes
instructions: In a medium bowl, whisk together mashed banana, egg, and milk.
In a separate bowl, mix together flour, baking powder, salt, and cinnamon.
Add dry ingredients to the banana mixture and stir until just combined.
Melt butter in a nonstick skillet over medium heat.
Pour pancake batter onto the skillet in 1/4-cup portions.
Cook pancakes for 2-3 minutes on each side, until golden brown.
Serve pancakes warm with maple syrup and additional sliced bananas, if desired.

foods.name: Breakfast Burrito
instructions: In a medium bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, salt, and black pepper.
Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add egg mixture to the skillet and cook, stirring frequently, until scrambled and cooked through, about 3-5 minutes.
Warm tortillas in the microwave for 15-20 seconds.
To assemble burritos, divide scrambled eggs among the tortillas.
Top each with shredded cheese, salsa, and chopped cilantro.
Roll up tortillas and serve immediately.

foods.name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast bread to desired level of crispiness.
In a small bowl, stir together mashed avocado, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper.
Spread avocado mixture over toasted bread slices.
In a small skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add red pepper flakes to the skillet and cook for 1-2 minutes.
Crack eggs into the skillet and cook until desired level of doneness, about 2-3 minutes for over-easy.
Top each toast with a cooked egg.
Garnish with chopped parsley and additional red pepper flakes, if desired.
Serve immediately.
foods.name: Loaded Sweet Potato Fries
instructions: Preheat oven to 425째F (220째C).
Peel sweet potato and cut into thin fries.
In a bowl, toss sweet potato fries with olive oil, salt, black pepper, garlic powder, and smoked paprika.
Spread fries in a single layer on a baking sheet.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, until crispy and golden brown.
Sprinkle cheddar cheese over the hot fries and return to the oven for 2-3 minutes, until cheese is melted.
Top with sliced scallions and crumbled bacon.
Serve immediately.

foods.name: Caprese Skewers
ingredients: 8 oz fresh mozzarella, cut into bite-sized pieces
instructions: Thread cherry tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and basil leaves onto wooden skewers.
Drizzle skewers with balsamic glaze and sprinkle with salt and black pepper.
Serve immediately.

foods.name: Hummus and Veggie Plate
instructions: Arrange hummus in a small bowl in the center of a plate.
Surround the hummus with sliced bell peppers, cucumber, and carrot.
Sprinkle kalamata olives and feta cheese over the top.
Serve immediately.
